create:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXIST MODULES(
              module_id VARCHAR PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT (hex( randomblob(16))),
              owner_group_id VARCHAR,
module_type VARCHAR,
source VARCHAR,
              FOREIGN KEY(owner_group_id) REFERENCES OWNER_GROUP(owner_group_id) 
            )
updateSingle:
UPDATE MODULES SET
            owner_group_id=@owner_group_id,
module_type=@module_type,
source=@source
            WHERE module_id=@module_id
countAll: SELECT COUNT(*) as records FROM MODULES
countBYowner_group_id:
SELECT COUNT(*) as records FROM MODULES 
          WHERE owner_group_id=@owner_group_id
